inventory-desc:
a mobile app
for little businesses

about-page.paragraph1: My name is Jordan Le Pera. Passionate about IT development, I exhibit in this portfolio the projects that I develop. I also plan to take the time to write articles on subjects that interest me mainly around web / mobile development and web design. I will also offer tutorials and share my useful links with you 😉.
about-page.paragraph2-1: To talk you more about me, I'm
about-page.paragraph2-2: years old, I'm living in France 🇫🇷, in Alsace 🥨, I love emojis (you will quickly realize it 😜) and I finished my studies not so long ago. I graduated as an Expert in Information Technology (BAC +5 / Master degree) from Epitech school in October 2019.
about-page.paragraph3: At the moment, I'm doing a lot of development on the React / React Native stack ⚛️, Node.js and GraphQL. I also have very good skills in C/C++, native iOS mobile development, .NET and I am very interested in Python 🐍. Following an entrepreneurial experience in which I had the chance to create a start-up and to evolve in this eco-system, I am now looking for a job 👨‍💻 in France, Switzerland or teleworking.
about-page.paragraph4: Codinov is in a way, the identity under which I wish to group all of my work, in connection with IT development.
about-page.paragraph5: I will be delighted to discuss with you so don't hesitate to contact me through my various social networks and to follow me so you won't miss any of my activities! 🙌
